properties.areaDesc: Wilmette Harbor to Northerly Island IL; Northerly Island to Calumet Harbor IL
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 3 at 3:27AM CST until February 5 at 6:00AM CST by NWS Chicago IL
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Chicago has issued a Small Craft
Advisory, which is in effect from midnight tonight to 6 AM CST
Wednesday.

* WINDS...North to 30 kt.

* SIGNIFICANT WAVES...to 11 ft.

* OCCASIONAL WAVES...to 14 ft.
properties.instruction:
A Small Craft Advisory means that wind speeds of 21 to 33 knots
are expected to produce hazardous wave conditions to small craft.
Inexperienced mariners...especially those operating smaller
vessels should avoid navigating in these conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 6 AM CST WEDNESDAY
